title: Hear Him through Service
description: How can you show love and care for your neighbor (think of someone specific) in a time of social distancing?

title: Hear Him through the Scriptures
description: What scriptures about Jesus Christ inspire you and are a source of motivation in your life?

title: Hear Him by Remembering Him
description: What do you do on a daily basis to remember the Savior?

title: Hear Him through Forgiveness
description: Who do you need to forgive? What past mistakes and offenses have you not forgiven yourself for?

title: Hear Him by through Prayer
description: While praying about your concerns, fears, and desires, what thoughts come to mind?

title: Hear Him through Worship
description: How do you hear the voice of God through worship?
